publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-738 Mr Adam Ingram: Dairy Industry—That the Parliament recognises the serious crisis affecting Scotland’s dairy industry; notes with concern that farm gate price has fallen by over 30% in the last three years, yet the retail milk price has remained virtually static, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to enter into a dialogue with the industry with a view to developing a strategy to ensure its long term future. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-738 Dairy Industry (lodged on 4 April 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
